name: Goblin Dreadnought
description: A small humanoid known for its agility and tactical prowess, equipped with a sabre and a shortbow. It uses stealth to ambush foes.
memorable: Its ability to evade and reposition makes it difficult for enemies to pin it down during combat.
goals: To ambush enemies and escape combat unharmed.
relations: Related to other goblin types and may be encountered with goblin raiders.
environment: Typically found in dark or wooded areas where it can utilize stealth.
strengths: High armor class for its challenge rating and effective stealth skills.
weaknesses: Limited hit points making it vulnerable to sustained attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a sabre for close combat and a shortbow for ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Nimble Escape allows tactical repositioning in combat.
senses: Possesses darkvision, enhancing its stealth capabilities in dim light.
skills: Proficient in stealth, giving it a +3 bonus to sneaking.
additional_information: Dexterity provides good agility for dodging.
Average intelligence and charisma, limiting social interactions.
Combat tactics focus on evasion and re-engaging at range.
test_queries: small agile humanoid with high AC
elusive creature that uses ranged weapons
